explains: adj. 不受影响的，无动于衷的；不能渗透的
wordGroup: impervious core 不透水心墙，隔水核心
impervious material 不透水材料；不透气物料

sentences.en: This also makes the painting impervious to water.
sentences.cn: 这也使得该幅画能防水。

sentences.en: She seems almost impervious to the criticism from all sides.
sentences.cn: 她好像对各方批评无动于衷。

sentences.en: It dispels the notion that the plants are impervious.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，认为这里的核电站不受影响的念头打消了。
